title: Summer Vacation
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Marks bottom margin, R, in pencil: [Rikio Takahashi]; bo
description: irregularly shaped purple form in UL with black, blue, red, and grey figures overlapping; large apostrophe shaped yellow figure overlaps purple figure; dark brown square shape with blue overlap and black swirl at R edge; light grey irregular figure at LRQ with long rust-colored overlapping form; grey figure resembling a question-mark overlaps at LLQ; light yellow background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
